title:
At the present Hollingsworth Drive dead ends at John D. Barry Drive.



When will Hollingsworth Drive be extended across John D. Barry Drive and into the shopping center where Lowe\'s Food Store is located.



It appears that there is space already set aside and it would eliminate having to go out to 17th Street extension.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=7537
